description: Re-engage lost opportunities with new angles, special offers, and value propositions
objectives: Address previous objections with new information
Showcase improvements, new features, or results

sequenceStrategy.approach: Fresh angle, not same old pitch

sequence.name: The Fresh Start
sequence.message:
Hey {{first_name}}, it's been a while since we talked about AI voice agents for {{business_name}}.

I know timing wasn't right before (or you went another direction), but wanted to check in:

Has anything changed on your end? Or did you find the solution you needed?

sequence.name: New Value Proposition
sequence.message:
{{first_name}}, a lot has changed since we last spoke:

{{new_developments}}

Thought you might be interested, especially if {{previous_objection}} was your concern. We've solved that now.

Worth another look?
sequence.goal: Show we've improved, address past objections
newDevelopments: New pricing tier for businesses your size

sequence.name: Social Proof Bomb
sequence.message:
Quick update, {{first_name}}:

We just helped {{competitor_or_similar_business}} in {{city/industry}} increase their booked appointments by {{percentage}}%.

They were skeptical too, but here's what changed their mind: {{key_benefit}}

Interested in hearing their story?

sequence.name: The Honest Approach
sequence.message:
{{first_name}}, I'll be honest with you:

I know we weren't the right fit last time. Maybe we still aren't. But I'd hate for you to miss out on {{big_benefit}} because of {{old_objection}}.

Can I ask - what would it take for this to be a no-brainer for you?

sequence.name: Special Offer
sequence.message:
{{first_name}}, wanted to run something by you:

{{special_offer}}

This is only available this month, and I immediately thought of you since we'd talked before.

Want to discuss if it makes sense for {{business_name}}?

sequence.name: Cost of Inaction
sequence.message:
{{first_name}}, quick thought exercise:

If you get {{estimated_leads}} leads/month and lose just 30% due to slow response (industry average), that's {{lost_revenue}} in missed revenue.

Over a year? {{annual_lost_revenue}}.

Not trying to be pushy - just want you to see the real cost of waiting. Make sense?

sequence.message:

if_re_engaged.message: Awesome! Let me get you reconnected with our team. When's a good time for a quick call?

positive_response.message: That's great! Let me get you reconnected with {{sales_rep}}. They'll get you up to speed on everything new. When works for a quick call?

still_not_ready.message: Totally understand! When should I check back in? 3 months? 6 months? Or just keep you on our quarterly newsletter?

happy_with_competitor.message: That's awesome you found something that works! If anything changes or you want to compare notes, we're here. Mind if I add you to our quarterly newsletter for industry insights?

wants_more_info.message: Sure thing! What specific info would be most helpful? Pricing? Case studies? ROI calculator? Or just want to see a quick demo?
